info.author: Matt Schartman
info.description:
# graphite\_reporter #
======================

Simple wrapper to enable graphite reporting

Installing
----------

::

    pip install GraphiteReporter

Using
-----

::

    from graphitereporter.graphite_reporter import GraphiteReporter 

Building and uploading to PyPI
------------------------------

See ``Makefile`` for help building and uploading.
